creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Barbara Porterfield
description: blue vase on small red circular platform; two stems with clusters yellow blossoms and some grasses leaning in L side of vase; inscription at R
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seal

R side, in Jap R center
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Yellow Chrysanthemums
